mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Segar, Joseph to Pierpont, Francis Harrison
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Segar, Joseph
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont], Wheeling, Mch 31 1862. By Telegraph from Washington 31 1862. Please say whether late elections for first Congressional district was not by your writ of election. Jos Segar 465 9th St. 16B.74pd joh
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Segar, Joseph
Washington, D.C.
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
